name: Block Game: Level 1
description:
Hello and welcome to my incredible block game. My high score for this level: 29

How to Play:

Keep the white block in the target area (dark square) while removing as many gray blocks as possible.

Click gray blocks to remove. If the white block is still in the target area 5 seconds after clicking, 1 point is added to your score.

Any pending points remaining when the white block falls out of the area are forfeit. Any gray blocks that fall off screen are added to your pending score. Good luck!
